General.Name: Sichuan Jiuzhou Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Jiuzhou Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the technology research and development, product manufacturing, and sale of intelligent terminals, air traffic control products, and microwave radio frequency products in China and internationally. It offers digital audio and video terminals; data communication terminals; front-end system equipment, such as optical transmitters, optical amplifiers, digital TV satellite receivers, digital TV platforms, modulators, encoders, and network management products; emergency broadcast products; and DBS receiving equipment. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Mianyang, China.
